column5: anybody ever done any fishing within the lake superior provincial park? and where?
Lots a good fishing right next to the road. Red rock and Collete are right next to the MNR office.

I typically take a trip every spring in early May the the gargantua area, fish the many rivers running into lake superior both at the mouth by boat and walking up the rivers for rainbows. usually even take a day or two and fish the inland lakes for pike. Just wondered if anyone else has been to the park I notice the majority of people on here hit up the walleye lakes more inland.
